alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:41AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradford, eastern Alachua, northwestern Marion, south central Baker, west central Putnam, Union and southwestern Clay Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1141 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Upland Pines to 6 miles south of University Of Florida. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Starke, Lake Butler, Keystone Heights, Raiford, Melrose, Worthington Spring, Hawthorne, Worthington Springs and University Of Florida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam
